Organization Name: ST FRANCIS OUTREACH AND THRIFT SHOP | MAIN OFFICE | TUE, THURS, SAT THRIFT SHOP
Description: Operates a thrift store for the community. Agency does not offer any direct financial assistance.

Organization Name: MARTIN UNITED METHODIST CHURCH | BEACON HOUSE | BEACON HOUSE THRIFT SHOP
Description: Provides secondhand clothing for adults/children-all sizes, small household items and appliances, shoes and other material goods at very low rates. Accept direct donations from the public of new and reusable goods. Proceeds support all Missions of the church.

Organization Name: MISSION CENTRAL METROPLEX | COAT OF MANY COLORS BEDFORD | COAT OF MANY COLORS RESALE SHOP
Description: Provides a resale shop with gently used merchandise such as clothing, housewares, books, CDs, DVDs and furniture. 100% of store profits go directly to support the work of Mission Central. This agency does not offer direct financial assistance of any kind.

Organization Name: CENTER FOR TRANSFORMING LIVES | THE RESALE SHOP | THE RESALE SHOP
Description: Sells clothing, shoes and accessories for women, men, and children as well as furniture, housewares and more. Welcomes donations of gently used merchandise.

Organization Name: MANSFIELD MISSION CENTER | LINDA NIX CLINIC | THRIFT SHOP
Description: Resells gently used (and some new) items at low prices, including: clothing, housewares, books, furniture and appliances. Donations of household items, accessories, clothing, toys, furniture and electronics are welcomed and accepted during store hours. Items not accepted are mattresses, sleeper sofas, paint or other flammables, drop-side cribs or non-digital TVs.
